SEARCH
Package papplevaa.notepad.model

Class Model

java.lang.Object
papplevaa.notepad.model.Model
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Model extends Object implements Serializable
Represents the data model for a notepad application, managing tabs and application settings. Implements the Serializable interface to support serialization.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Model

      public Model()
      Constructs a new Model with default values. Initializes an empty list of tabs, sets the selected index to -1, enables dark mode, and sets the initial window dimensions to minimum values.

  • Method Details

    • getDataPath

      public static File getDataPath()
      Gets the data file path for serialization.
      Returns:
      The data file path.

    • addTab

      public void addTab(Tab tab)
      Adds a new tab to the model.
      Parameters:
      tab - The tab to be added.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the provided tab is null.

    • removeTab

      public void removeTab(int tabIndex)
      Removes a tab at the specified index from the model.
      Parameters:
      tabIndex - The index of the tab to be removed.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of bounds.

    • getNumberOfTabs

      public int getNumberOfTabs()
      Gets the number of tabs in the model.
      Returns:
      The number of tabs.

    • isSelected

      public boolean isSelected()
      Checks if a tab is currently selected in the model.
      Returns:
      True if a tab is selected, false otherwise.

    • getSelectedIndex

      public int getSelectedIndex()
      Gets the index of the currently selected tab.
      Returns:
      The index of the selected tab.

    • setSelectedIndex

      public void setSelectedIndex(int selectedIndex)
      Sets the index of the currently selected tab.
      Parameters:
      selectedIndex - The index to be set as the selected tab.

    • getTabAt

      public Tab getTabAt(int index)
      Gets the tab at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the tab to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The tab at the specified index.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of bounds.

    • indexOfTab

      public int indexOfTab(Tab tab) throws NoSuchElementException
      Gets the index of a specified tab in the model.
      Parameters:
      tab - The tab to find the index of.
      Returns:
      The index of the specified tab.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the tab is not found in the model.

    • isDarkMode

      public boolean isDarkMode()
      Checks if dark mode is enabled.
      Returns:
      True if dark mode is enabled, false otherwise.

    • setDarkMode

      public void setDarkMode(boolean darkMode)
      Sets the dark mode status.
      Parameters:
      darkMode - True to enable dark mode, false to disable.
